Detailed Description

Abstract class for easy de-archiving CreaturesArchives Used by CREABlock and GLSTBlock

Instantiates a new CreaturesArchiveBlock

Parameters:
$prayfile The PRAYFile this CreaturesArchive belongs to. May be null.
$name The name of this block
$content This block's binary data.
$flags the flags of this block
$type This block's type as one of the PRAY_BLOCK_* constants
